item.description:
JOIN US ANYTIME BETWEEN 5:45PM AND 7PM.

For those who'd like to grab a quick bite to eat before the movie (or just grab a quick bite), let's meet at the Chipotle Grill at 5:45 for a quick dinner.

Chipotle Grill is located diagonally from Olive Garden in the Shoppers World Plaza. It has counter service, so come whenever you can, and you'll be done in plenty of time before the movie. We'll be there until about 7pm.
item.how_to_find_us: Let's meet just inside the restaurant. I look like my picture.
item.name: Quick Dinner before "Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen " Movie
